select mi.id, mi.student_id, mi.content, mi.book_id, mi.status, mi.create_date, si.student_name, si.code, si.images from message_info mi left join student_info si on (si.id = mi.student_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.student_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.studentName},'%')
AND si.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.code},'%')
order by mi.create_date desc
